alert.note: Alert for Lake (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 10:21AM CST until March 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Missouri... Mississippi River Above Tiptonville For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River Above Tiptonville. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, In Tennessee, water begins to go over Tiptonville Ferry Road, Barr Road, and the farm land east of the Tiptonville Ferry Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 37.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 34.3 feet Thursday, March 17. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
